com.symbian.commdb.convert
Class cfg2xml

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.symbian.commdb.convert.cfg2xml
public class cfg2xml
extends java.lang.Object

This is a utility which can be used in order to convert one or more CommDB settings files of the pre-XML format (*.cfg) to the XML format.

Field Summary
private static Database commdb
          The CommDB database to create
private static boolean fileMode
          A flag which determines whether this utility operates in file mode (true) or in directory mode (false)

ConvertFile

private static void ConvertFile(java.lang.String fileIn,
                                java.lang.String fileOut)
                         throws DatabaseException,
                                java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                java.io.IOException
This function performs the conversion of a .CFG file to an .XML file

Parameters:
fileIn - The name of the input (CFG) file to convert
fileOut - The name of the output (XML) file to generate
Throws:
DatabaseException, - FileNotFoundException, IOException
DatabaseException
java.io.FileNotFoundException
java.io.IOException

ConvertDirectory

private static void ConvertDirectory(java.io.File dirConvert)
This function parses a directory and converts all .cfg files to .xml files. If subdirectories are encountered, they are also examined for .cfg files and this function is called recursively to handle all subdirectories.

Parameters:
dirConvert - The directory to convert all the .cfg files it contains to .xml
